title: Blended Learning-Based Elementary Social Studies Practical Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary curriculum knowledge, basic social studies comprehension, and fundamental digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: A course for current elementary school teachers to strengthen social studies practical competencies in blended learning environments, requiring simulation/VR-based practical training and balanced online-offline design in digital device-provided settings

learning_goals: Learners can determine the appropriate ratio of online and offline components when designing social studies lessons in blended learning environments
Learners can practice at least three field application scenarios for social studies using VR simulation tools
Learners can improve blended learning lesson plans developed through project-based assessments based on peer feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
